Mumbai : 

In 2011-14 The Difference went more than 200. But for the rest of the years it was upto only 200.

Delhi :

It was upto 140 for all time but only for 2006 it went up to 160

A'bad :

In 2008, it went up to 300, rest up to 200

Delhi :
